channel.title: Changing resolution?
channel.description: Hi, can anyone help me with changing the resolution of the game? My monitor is 1600x900, but the in game options don't go that high, and when I choose 16:9 (widescreen), nothing happens. Thanks!

item.title: Changing resolution?
item.dc:creator: Bilge
item.description:
niktay:

Hi, can anyone help me with changing the resolution of the game? My monitor is 1600x900, but the in game options don’t go that high, and when I choose 16:9 (widescreen), nothing happens. Thanks!

I am having the exact same problem on my laptop. The resolution only goes to 1024 x 768, and widescreen changes do nothing when applied. Does anyone have a fix?

Read full topic
